results.title: The effect of simvastatin therapy on hemorheological profile in coronary heart desease (CHD) patients.
results.text_hl: The effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ therapy on hemorheological profile in @DISEASE_Coronary_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary heart desease@@@ (@DISEASE_Coronary_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@CHD@@@) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Muravyov AV, Yakusevich VV, Surovaya L, Petrochenko A. The effect of simvastatin therapy on hemorheological profile in coronary heart desease (CHD) patients. Clin Hemorheol Microcirc. 2004;31(4):251-6. PMID: 15567894

results.title: Simvastatin mitigates functional and structural impairment of lung and right ventricle in a rat model of cigarette smoke-induced COPD.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ partly reverses @DISEASE_Lung_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D055370 @@@lung function@@@ decline and attenuates @<m>DISEASE_Myopathies_Structural_Congenital</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020914 @@@structural impairments of lung and@@@ right @DISEASE_Cerebral_Ventricle_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D002551 @@@ventricle@@@ possibly through reducing 5-HTT content in the model of @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@COPD@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang Y, Jiang X, Zhang L, Wang L, Li Z, Sun W. Simvastatin mitigates functional and structural impairment of lung and right ventricle in a rat model of cigarette smoke-induced COPD. Int J Clin Exp Pathol. 2014;7(12):8553-62. PMID: 25674219
